opendial.state.nodes

Class ProbabilityRuleNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.bn.nodes.BNode
      • opendial.bn.nodes.ChanceNode
        • opendial.state.nodes.ProbabilityRuleNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BNode>

    public class ProbabilityRuleNode
extends ChanceNode
    Representation of a chance node describing the probability distribution over the possible effects of a probability rule depending on its inputs.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-02-04 09:51:48 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
